Text: This is actually part one of "Domestic" - BBC pulled "And then I fell in Love" at the last minute for legal reasons.

Apparently both episodes of 'and then i fell in love', but they were pulled when the decision was made about pulling the show these last couple days due to a court case involving a similar crime.
Hopefully someone who seeds will have downloaded it, and will at some point upload them for all to see!

Ignore my nonsensical first comment - here goes again: 

Apparently both episodes of 'and then i fell in love', were available on itunes during April, but they were pulled when the decision was made to not air them on TV, due to a court case involving a similar crime.
Hopefully someone who seeds will have downloaded it, and will at some point upload them for all to see!

Season 15 - Order of Episodes (how they should be)...

S15 - E01 & E02 - Death Has No Dominion (Part 1 & 2)
S15 - E03 & E04 - Domestic (Part 1 & 2)
S15 - E05 & E06 - Paradise Lost (Part 1 & 2)
S15 - E07 & E08 - Redhill (Part 1 & 2)
S15 - E09 & E10 - Fear (Part 1 & 2)
S15 - E11 & E12 - And Then I Fell In Love (Part 1 & 2)
